verses.name: John 19:1
verses.text: Then Pilate therefore took Jesus, and scourged him.

verses.name: John 19:2
verses.text: And the soldiers platted a crown of thorns, and put it on his head, and they put on him a purple robe,

verses.name: John 19:3
verses.text: And said, Hail, King of the Jews! and they smote him with their hands.

verses.name: John 19:4
verses.text: Pilate therefore went forth again, and saith unto them, Behold, I bring him forth to you, that ye may know that I find no fault in him.

verses.name: John 19:5
verses.text: Then came Jesus forth, wearing the crown of thorns, and the purple robe. And Pilate saith unto them, Behold the man!
